meanings.definition: To feel or show great joy or delight.
meanings.sent1: The children rejoiced when they saw the colorful balloons.
meanings.sent2: She rejoiced at the news of her promotion.
meanings.sent3: The puppy rejoiced by wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden rejoiced under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The students rejoiced loudly after winning the championship.

meanings.sent1: He rejoiced in the simple pleasures of life.
meanings.sent2: They rejoiced in the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: The cat rejoiced in catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The birds rejoiced in their freedom to soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The family rejoiced together during the holiday festivities.
